briefTitle: Efficiency Study to Investigate Blonanserin in Treatment of Schizophrenia When Compared With Risperidone
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-blinded, Double-dummy, Parallel-controlled and Multicenter Study to Investigate Blonanserin in Treatment of Schizophrenia When Compared With Risperidone
summary: A Randomized, Double-blinded, Double-dummy, Parallel-controlled and Multicenter Clinical trial to Investigate Blonanserin in Treatment of Schizophrenia when compared with Risperidone

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in PANSS(Positive and Negative Syndrome Scale) Total Score at Week 8
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From baseline to the end of study„ÄÅweek 8(day 56)or before other antipsychotic taken.
